title: Question about Worlds Master Pass
body:
Hey, I just wanna ask how that truely works because i am a bit confused...
...like do I have to buy the pass every week to get the weekly bonus missions or just a 1 time one?

Because on the page (link: http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/esports/esports-editorial/worlds-2017-missions-loot) it says that i can get 12 extra missions for 1300 RP. But in the store the descriptions says 2 missions only (screenshot: http://puu.sh/xHnd4/4992585d6b.png).

Ty in advance

Edit:
also do i need to buy the normal champion ship ashe skin to unlock chroma for 320 tokens or can i use it without having the basic one?

replies.body: i just stared the missions and i bought the worlds master pass i have 35 tokens. but i bought the worlds master pass today does that mean i will still have enough time to do the missions and be able to get the chroma and the ashe boarder or im i out of time. (i have the master pass just bought it today)

been 2 weeks now, 3 missions left... none are opening up.
do you have to buy the pass? stuck at 40 tokens ... smh

u get 2 regular missions per week, 2 bonus if u get masterpass, which give you even way more tokens than regular missions,
unfortunately if u buy the master pass now, u wont get the older missions cuz they have expired alrdy,
but dont worry thats why rito decreases the price of master pass every week and also the last weeks give u the most tokens (like 40-80 per mission if i have remembered it right)

2 missions is a typo or intended due to only 2 missions being avail per week. You will have gotten 12 missions by the end of the event, **you only need to buy the pass once**. I believe the missions last only a week per 2 which is why the price drops a little each week. 

You need to purchase Championship Ashe to use the chroma. You dont need the skin to get the chroma. You could buy the skin later and still have the chroma.

This is all pretty spot on! 

Only buy the pass once, and you'll get more missions each week as Worlds progresses. You also need the Ashe Skin to use the Chroma, but you don't need the chroma to use the skin of course.

If your late to the party can you still get all the mission, enough to get the chrome? And if you get the chrome that way but don't own the skin do you still get the chrome if you buy at a later date?
When do we get more missions? I bought my the second it came out and haven't received any new missions
Finally got that info on our end! Looks like the next set of missions will be popping up on Oct 2!
With buying the pass, is it possible to have obtained the border and the chroma by the end of the event?

Completing ALL of the Missions will get you 175 Tokens for free. The Master Pass will give you access to an additional 560 Tokens for a total of 735 Tokens. These Tokens will expire on 12/4/17 at 11:59 p.m. PT. Additional ways to unlock Tokens is via Hextech Crafting:
